product_name: Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones
long_description: Cut the cords and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones. These stereo Bluetooth(R) earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move. TwistLock technology locks in place comfortably to help prevent the earbuds from hurting or falling out. Made with flexible silicone, Yurbuds are ergonomically designed to avoid nerve-rich areas of the ear; they are ultra-soft and comfortable for hours on end. 15mm drivers deliver the big sound, providing the motivation you need to keep going with no strings attached. Sweat- and water-resistant earphones feature a 3-button track/call control with a wind-blocking microphone designed for call clarity. Athlete-tested battery lasts up to 6 hours and provides visual and audible indicators when running low. Dedicated pairing button allows simple 1-touch pairing with any Bluetooth-enabled device. The Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones feature a woven cloth cord, ambient noise awareness and IPX5 resistance to sweat and water.
short_description: Cut the cords and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones. These stereo Bluetooth(R) earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
